resources.string: I\'m curious, love to learn and easy to work with. I\'m not afraid to ask, can navigate easily through other areas, be it to solve problems, understand how the areas connect or strengthen work relationships. I like to help people, and I\'m constantly thinking on ways to improve my work, both in quality and agility. I\'m curious, love to learn and easy to work with.
